This game is [b]amazing[/b] - terrifying, exciting and confusing as a new player, and later on when you get experienced the horror naturally fades into the background, but is beautifully replaced by endless adrenaline fuelled exciting moments of gameplay.

Edit: Matchmaking got fixed, changed to a thumbs up. Some balance issues remain, but that's to be expected in a multiplayer game. Game is fucking fun at it's core.

The game itself is actually very nice it's built 4 vs 1.
 4 Humans against a "let's say monster" its difficult to escape but it is also difficult to get all 4 survivors dead. You have to be smart trick the monster and hide in lockers and stuff. The objective of the humans is to activate the engines so the escape routes open and you can run away. The objective of the monster is to kill the humans it has advantages because it can see the engines where the humans have to go. Obviously the humans can help each other with healing and repairing engines and they can block the way behind them when they put wooden obstacles on the ground.
THE GAME IS SICK I LOVE IT BUT THE PROBLEM IS YOU SEARCH SO LONG TO EVEN FIND A MULTIPLAYER GAME!!! (BUG IS FIXED NOW FOR ME) Perfect Game going to buy it after playing free weekend.

Cheers Dead by Daylight Team & thanks for the free weekend

И так епт, игра про то как за тобой гоняться батя или мамка,а ты пытаешься побыстее съебаться от них, со своими братьсями и сестреми, но всё как всегда закончиться приездом в Дет-ДОМ, и пока батя пидит твою сестру и вешате её на свой крюк, вмсето того чтобы вместе от*издать эту шлюхю, ты должен спасти её, какая то неправильная игра, сразу видно разработчики гуманитарии. И пока вы не почините все генеарторы вы не сбежите, но зачем играть в команде ведь можно ныкаться по кустам. дааааа, конечно а еще сраться от любого шороха и "террора", а так же продолжать фейлить скил чеки ведь это пиздец как трудно попасть вы чего, для этого же руки надо иметь, а еще глаза, пиздец я вам условия ставлю, вот дебила кусок играть не умеющий, а вы то про блядь. 12/10 раков в тиме.
P.S. Сама игра отличная и я её люблю. В обзоре я описал большую половину людей, которые играют в ней, и к сожалению это правда(((

 #bestdevs

The idea of this game is amazing.  Even playing it some matches is amazing.  But the lack of understanding of the problems the game has by the dev team is the final straw for me.  This game introduced its first DLC (which added a new Killer, new Survivor, and a SLEW of other mechanics changes) before getting the matchmaking system working correctly (among a ton of other mechanic and balancing problems).  The game has been, since launch, a killer-favored game.  It probably even should be.  That hasn't stopped the dev team from nerfing survivors constantly in every patch.  

There was a problem with certain areas of the map exploiting game mechanics so that survivors could infintely run away from killers.  You usually saw this in higher level play. It was a serious problem that needed to be fixed, probably by removing/changing the infinite area. The dev team's response?  Nerf the mechanics involved in the infinite, instead of just removing the actual source of the problem.  The consequence of this nerf?  Survivors have an even harder time running away from the killer who is 10% faster than them.  It just doens't make sense.  

I had high hopes that the game would be fixed and that the dev team would listen to the community about the problems.  They haven't.  On top of that their solutions are terrible (or there just aren't any 'solutions' at all).  I know it's a small team.  However, I've seen small teams do amazing things.  You know what's not amazing?  The dev team only wanting 1 survivor of 4 surviving every round.  That's ludicrous.  There is a disconnect between what the dev team wants from the game and what is fair/realistic/fun.  I'm sorry.  I can't keep being frustrated every time I open this game in hopes that I won't for once.  Listen to the community, devs.  They're the ones playing your game.

考虑了许久还是给了不推荐先说明一下游戏的优点
1.死里逃生的紧张感和扮演恐怖电影里恐怖角色的新鲜感

2.多种技能对角色进行强化很有趣

3.可以肆意的展现人性的丑恶(·∀·)

4.编不下去了
————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
我是在经常看直播的朋友的强烈推荐下入了此游戏，本人不看直播所以也不知道主播们玩起来的欢乐景象是什么样的不过就我而言
从一个普通玩家角度来看黎明杀机作为游戏可以说"好看"但是相当的"不好玩"具体理由有以下几点
1.近似于抽奖系统一般的技能树

	作为一款靠技能来推进游戏操作和玩法多样化的游戏，技能树居然是一个纯粹靠人品的机制，
	游戏平衡性简直在一开始就得不到保障。好人品一开始就能抽出有用的道具和技能，运气差
        的则要花上许多强行增加的不必要游戏时间才能收获一点成就与喜悦感。
2.过于单一的游戏模式

	也许写在游戏的早期并不合适，不过在不同角色的操作与使用几乎没什么差别的情况下，只有
	一种的胜负判定的模式难免会很快的让人产生厌倦感【当然也有许多粉丝对这一模式乐此不疲，
	这里只是代表我一个初入steam坑的新人观点。
3.联机优化实在不容乐观

	尽管有许多人可能是喜欢享受独自的恐怖生存体验，但有更多人可能是和我一样是想和朋友一
	起联机游玩，但是就我和朋友游玩的情况而言，每次的联机都像是抽奖一样（又是tmd抽奖）
	邀请后能正常进行游戏的次数很少，在解决联机问题上所花的游戏时间远比真正的进行游戏的
	时间来的长得多，而且经常性的闪退和崩溃。

4?.这点不知道有哪些人遇到过，我每次正常退出游戏都还是显示正在运行，必须要强关才行。

5?.听说最近排位全部统一降至20了？
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
总的来说希望以后更新能尽量的改善游戏的一些机制和优化网络【感觉没多大戏就是了

第一次写评测杀鸡粉们留条活路

The game isn't perfect by any means. But not every match is going to be enjoyable, and your expectations for every one to be a ton of fun should move, else you'll be one of the people whining when things don't go your way.

Matchmaking -- It's pretty messed up for the moment. Sometimes it takes a long time for you to get in a match, sometimes it doesn't. Low rank killers can get matched with high rank killers, and vice versa. I believe lobby dodging has a punishment now for killers who dodge? A 15 minute cool down? Anyways, just play the game to the best of your ability. You don't need to hook every person to pip. You don't even need to hook one person. Just keep up the chase. Not every match is going to go your way. Same for survivors. Just play to the best of your ability. You can't win every time. That's how most multiplayer games work, yeah?

Perks - Perks are DECENTLY balanced at the moment. Saboteur, while not receiving a nerf to its stats, is balanced now in my opinion because of the global warning and point decrease. Thanks to this, hopefully the meta will change from iron grasp 3 and agitation 3 being a must, therefore giving survivors more of a chance to wiggle free. That's my hope anyways. :^)

New Window Vaulting -- Please... This needs to go back to the way it was in the previous patch. It seems near impossible to get a sprint vault. I think what they had done previously to it was the best fix. This has made windows incredibly unreliable, where previously they were a go-to that gave you a little bit of time and space to get away from the killer. I really hope they return this to the way it was.

All in all, the game can be enjoyable, and it can be annoying. You can't win every time. The most annoying things are waiting and window vaulting. I'm choosing not to address The Nurse because I don't have an opinion fully formed on her. She's hard to play so far, but not all counters have been introduced as it's only day 2 of her release. Expect people to make guides on "How To Play (Against) The Nurse".

tl;dr -- Waiting is annoying, but it's not complete cancer. Metas change pretty frequently. Hopefully the IG3 AG3 meta changes bc of saboteur nerf. New window vaulting is busted. You can't win every game. Don't complain when you don't.

I cannot say enough good things about this game. From the first match played, the dire realization sinks in as the words fill your mind: "I'm not going to make it out alive from here." 


Playing as a survivor, that feeling never changes no matter how many times you play. Every match keeps you on the edge of your toes - feeling as though your chances of living to see daylight again are so slim that you contemplate giving up that very moment. This intense amount of emotion only makes surviving (winning) all the more fulfilling when you do manage to outsmart, or out luck, the killer. 


Playing as the killer only adds an even more intense emotional struggle to the mix: the sudden desire to snuff the life out of the four poor souls that wandered onto your hunting ground. The satisfaction that comes with the hunt, the primal need to spill the blood from your prey, and the smile that curls across your lips  as you hear the meat hook spreading open their flesh... At moments it's as though you're falling too deeply into the rabit hole that is the mind of the killer...


And when the game is over, and you turn off your computer, you find yourself lying in bed later that night, staring up at the ceiling fan whirling haphazardly around and around... suddenly wondering how it is you're still feeling shaken from all that you witnessed earlier in Dead by Daylight. Wondering if deep down inside you're struggling through life - trying to survive till daylight - or if the thoughts from the mind of the killer will forever keep you buried in your own darkness...


No words can truly describe what it is this game will make you feel. However, I made a video/trailer in an attempt to capture the psychological elements and emotions Dead by Daylight can evoke:
https://youtu.be/oDAhIessTN4

While there are a few things about this game that make it fun, those are easily outweighed by all the bugs in the game and with each new patch, more bugs are found. Even trying to get into a game is a headache and a chore, for ever 10 minutes spent playing the actual game, you will spend hours in the lobby simulator trying to actually get into a game. The balance between the survivors and killers is a joke and the devs seem out of touch with their own game. Steer clear of this until they fix this game.

***after many more hours I still wouldn't recommend this game. Servers are a joke and the devs make enough money to either hire competent people to fix the issues or better servers.

**** Boon Totems. Remove them from the game or make it when you snuff them, the totem breaks.

Люблю разработчиков этой игры, пилить патч полгода, а затем у большинства проблемы с фпс и загрузкой игры. Она просто не загружается и выдаёт ошибку, в том числе и у меня. Самохила с зарядом нет, хотя наши сурвы ой как разнылись по поводу этого. Они ныли, что мол киллеров апают, но если ты играешь один, это одно дело, а когда в пати, это совсем другое. Не ввели один течбл перк, так что в данном плане всё хорошо. Но  разработчки такие дауны, что в этой игре багоюзы на каждом шагу, за сурва можно выбить всех персов 3 престижа, имея только одного прокаченного до 3 престижа 50 уровня, фонари с катушкой, можно даже перки стакать, хотя разрабы сказали, что этого нет. Верить им вообще нельзя, я наиграл до хера, мне обидно, что я потерял столько времени на эту парашу неоптимизированную. А комьюнити дбд это вообще отдельная тема. Так что лучше взять фор онор за 2к и не мучаться с багами и ужасной оптимизацией.

КРИТИКА НА ДАННЫЙ МОМЕНТ! 
В игру внедряются новые маньяки и выжившие - это хорошо, НО баги, недочеты, лаганые текстуры, разрывы хоста не исправляются с РЕЛИЗА игры. Советую покупать игру ТОЛЬКО после исправления всех вышесказанных ошибок и недочетов, так как играть, в большинстве случаев, невозможно или просто потратите КУЧУ нервов. Спасибо за внимание.

I must say, this game has come a long way. Yes, the community is hella toxic but I've had a lot of fun playing this game (especially with friends) I'm excited for the future of dead by daylight. I honestly thank the dev team for their hard work (And yes I know this game has a lot of bugs, but honestly.. if you think you can do a better job, then do it) You start off rank 20 and work your way towards rank 1. The ranks reset every month (The 13th of each month) And you unlock different perks and progress through the bloodweb. You also get the shrine where you can save up shards and spend them on teachable perks which any of your character can learn. You can prestige your character after level 50 which means you will lose all the perks and items, but you have the chance of getting rare perks and items the more you prestige. They also added a store page where you can spend real money for outfits if you so desire. They constantly put this game on sale and on free weekends so if you're dubious, I would say try before buy. Anyway, enough of the tutorial.. Great game and great atmosphere with a promosing future.

Всем привет! В этом обзоре я выскажу свое мнение о Dead by daylight.
Начнем с плюсов.

1.Первое, за что я хочу похвалить Dead by Daylight - это оригинальная задумка, а также за реализованную идею разработчиков, ведь мало игр в таком жанре, тем более по сети.

2. В игре своеобразный и неповторимый setting.

3.Каждый герый в игре своеобразен, имеет неповторимую историю и индивидуальные перки.

Минусы.



1.Кемперство. Да, кто-то считает это тактикой,но блин когда ты попадаешься в руки кемпера это пи*дец как обидно.

2.Все знаменитые убийцы и выжившие из фильмов платные.

3.Порой надоедает игровой процесс, поэтому лучше играть с друзьями.(С ними игровая обстановка совсем другой становится((

Let me start off by saying that I so badly want to love this game. I absolutely love the concept, I love the gameplay, I love the rush of adrenaline that it gives me. This game is wicked fun, and losing or winning, I have a ball every time!

... When I can actually get a match, stay connected without issues, and see the game all the way through to the grisly end without unintended issues like clipping into a rock and getting stuck thanks to interpolation issues.

I've given this game nearly a day of hours in gameplay, and most of that has been spent sitting in a lobby attempting to connect to a match. A lack of a proper queuing system,  no matchmaking filters, and flakier than acceptable client code makes this game more of a chore than a game. If you attempt to queue into a match and the game fails to connect you after about 10 seconds, you are forced to manually start searching again. If you leave a lobby, you are forced to wait 10 seconds before you can join another one. If the killer disconnects from the lobby and you are playing as a survivor, the lobby is disbanded and you are forced to start the process of finding a lobby all over again.

Take note, this is describing the process of getting into a pre-game lobby as a single player. If you are trying to play with a group of friends as survivors, good luck getting into a game at all. As of the time of this writing, I have already had more than two occasions in which I had a full group of survivors and was never matched to a killer after more than 30 minutes of attempting to queue.

Once into a match, the game runs fairly smooth, but the host has advantage (the host is always the killer), and if they are on a poor connection, you can expect rubber banding and location resolution issues as the game attempts to compensate your position for your killer's connection. Some of the myriad problems I've run into (only rarely, but often enough to be mentioned) are being relocated into a rock and stuck long after all of the other survivors have exited the match; rocketing forward twice the distance I should have traveled directly into a wall and stuck there as I watched the killer walk up to me and proceed to smash me into it; being suddenly moved two character widths to the right as I attempt to climb through a window, thus rendering the window unusable and me a sitting duck for the wraith who was following me; and many more, all random, but all usually at the worst possible times.

As of this review, I've uninstalled the game entirely, and I refuse to install it again until I see patch notes fixing, at the very least, the matchmaking issues. I wouldn't recommend this game to anybody at its current price in its current state. Buy at your own risk.

Но если серьезно сама затея игры неплохая,но её для начала нужно проработать.Что я могу сказать,так это, то что игра ещё сырая,в ней очень много багов,как геймплейных так и визуальных,проблемы с балансом(после последнего обновления,к нему мы еще вернемся) и последнее (ИМХО) самое раздражающие так это сервера,которых просто НЕТ(сервер хостит маньяк,благодаря этому он может делать всё,что угодно).Проблемы с подключением тоже не менее важная проблема,когда в игру играют более 25к человек и ты не можешь найти сервер,и к тому же еще каждый раз тебе требуется нажимать ГОТОВ,либо тебя вообще выкидывает в главное меню,но после обновления 1.1.0 игру вообще невозможно найти.Но всё же я рекомендую её,лично я вижу в ней большой потенциал хоть в ней так много различных багов,разработчики стараются их фиксить(хотя своими фиксами они их и добавляют xD).Надеюсь в будущем игра станет лучше.

Dead by Daylight это:
Когда поиск игры длится дольше, чем сама игра.
Когда на первых парах игры ловишь инфаркты от каждого появления маньяка.
Когда сидишь около генератора и боишься его завести.
Когда хочешь нарядить выжившего, но вся крутая одежда слишком яркая и палит тебя.
DBD это любовь
